overview:
Ben has a deep understanding of the financial services industry. For almost two decades, he has helped companies specializing in financial services, consumer products, information technology, and marketing automation prosper and grow. Before joining North Hill Ventures, Ben was a Project Leader at The Boston Consulting Group, where he focused on serving financial services corporations and companies that supply them with critical infrastructure components. His consulting engagements included strategic alternatives analyses, product development studies, and merger and acquisition evaluations. Earlier in his career, Ben also worked as a consultant at McKinsey and Company.

Ben holds an M.B.A. from the Graduate School of Business at the University of Chicago, and a B.A. in Quantitative Economics and Political Science from Stanford University.
